summary:
Driven by a passion for growth & development, I started my venture AmalgaMind. With AmalgaMind we intend to shape up the youth along the lines of different growth dimensions including cognitive, emotional, social, and purpose spectrums. We start early to tap into the high neuroplasticity available during these years. While building Amalgamind, we discovered various gaps in the complex structure of human growth & potential, hence now I am highly driven towards building a framework to tap into human potential & human purpose. 

Prior worked with Mantri Developers as Financial Analyst & EA to Chairman. Involved in business planning, strategic analyses, providing suggestions/ideas to improve business performance/valuation, Developing an implementation plan for strategies adopted, provide strategies to improve the efficiency of people & processes. Prior to that worked with an infrastructure firm. Involved in the complete business cycle from investments, project financing, financial planning, control, strategy analysis to management reporting. Also worked in research & valuation domain both in equity & debt side. Completed MBA from ISB Hyderabad and CFA Level II.

profile_positions.description:
AmalgaMind is an Edtech Startup focused on providing 21st Century Skills to children and teens. 
Our Programs focus on unleashing the infinite human potential by tapping into  
Holistic Qs include IQ, EQ, SQ, and PQ. 
We aim to develop children and teens into holistic beings by nurturing them into thinkers/problem-solvers who are emotionally balanced, socially connected, and purpose-driven leaders. 

The program curriculum is designed by experts and delivered by certified and trained teachers. We render these programs through Live online sessions in a fun, engaging, and interactive manner.

Developed an educational games app for children in the age group of 4-12 years. This App is focused on developing the cognitive skills of children during their early years. The App was downloaded by 60000 users in its very first year with a rating of 4.5 on the Google Play store.

- Training Design & Delivery: Conducted needs analyses based on organizational, job, and individual needs. Designed and delivered comprehensive teacher training programs to foster desired skills and knowledge. Implemented an evaluation system to gauge the effectiveness of training transfer.

- Developed Learning Culture:  Introduced learning interventions based on 70:20:10 model including practices relating to knowledge sharing, coaching,  job rotation, experimentation and shadowing.

- Designed and implemented processes to improve performance, through developmental planning, 360-degree feedback, and creating safe environment.

- Change Management: Led change management efforts, including new market expansions and the transition from offline to online operations  

- Developed an end-to-end recruitment and onboarding procedure
- Retention Strategy: Developed an in-house '5Cs' framework tailored to employees' unique needs. 
- Identified key performance metrics, to assess trends, enhance efficiency and for decision making.
